name: Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome
description:
Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome is a multiplayer split-screen beat 'em up with cartoon-styled characters. Players can fight robots with their team and possibly survive long enough to defeat the final boss at the end. Players can level up by cooperating and defeating enemies, charging up their super meters as they do so to perform powerful attacks.

  • Play as one of three characters: Orrek the Orc, Sylene the Elf, and Karamine the Fairy
  • Battle waves of robots to become stronger
  • Unleash powerful moves while cooperating with others and defeating enemies
  • Use your skills to defeat the almighty Dr. Faustus

*Controllers required for local multiplayer
